choose.when: SELECT r.code ,r.acc_code ,e.emp_name AS empName ,r.doc_form_code ,r.doc_title ,r.doc_name ,r.re_doc_date ,r.writer_day ,r.comments ,D.dename ,p.poname FROM RETURN_DOC_SAVE AS r LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE AS e ON r.emp_code = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN APP_LINE_ACCRUE AS a ON r.acc_code = a.CODE LEFT JOIN DOC_FORM_MANAGE AS d ON r.doc_form_code = d.CODE LEFT JOIN DEMG AS D ON e.demgcode = D.CODE LEFT JOIN POSISYS AS p ON e.pocode = p.code WHERE r.emp_code = #{sid}

SELECT
A.number, A.CODE, B.doc_title, B.doc_name, A.app_state, C.dename, D.poname, E.emp_name, F.s_section, e.emp_name AS empName, DATE_FORMAT(B.writer_day,'%Y-%m-%d') AS writer_day FROM APP_LINE_ACCRUE A LEFT JOIN SIG_DOC B ON A.doc_code = B.CODE LEFT JOIN DEMG C ON A.demgcode = C.code LEFT JOIN POSISYS D ON A.pocode = D.code LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE E ON A.app_person = E.emp_num LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE e on B.emp_code = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN LIST_MANAGE F ON A.sortation = F.code

SELECT r.code ,r.acc_code ,e.emp_name AS empName ,r.doc_form_code ,r.doc_title ,r.doc_name ,r.re_doc_date ,r.writer_day ,r.comments ,D.dename ,p.poname FROM RETURN_DOC_SAVE AS r LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE AS e ON r.emp_code = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN APP_LINE_ACCRUE AS a ON r.acc_code = a.CODE LEFT JOIN DOC_FORM_MANAGE AS d ON r.doc_form_code = d.CODE LEFT JOIN DEMG AS D ON e.demgcode = D.CODE LEFT JOIN POSISYS AS p ON e.pocode = p.code WHERE r.emp_code = #{sid}
